title: Jolly Farm Revue
description: Join Mother Maggie, Melody Sheep, and Pengrove Pig for a story and sing-along at Jolly Farm. And welcome Bernie and Gert, Large Bird, and Moody Green Garbage Creature for the American version.
quote: The sun has risen on another day on Jolly Farm. Let’s see what life’s rich pageant has in store for us!
altHero: Mother Maggie, a sparkling woman who wears all white and a flower crown in front of rolling hills of green grass
alt1: Mother Maggie with some kids eating breakfast and Melody Sheep plays music
alt2: Pengrove Pig sits on a stump and reads a book
alt3: two small children talk with Large Bird and Moody Green Garbage Creature (Big Bird and Oscar the Grouch parodies)
alt4: new brunette Mother Maggie with three kids
